sys_script.name: Assign button

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_622b6eb8976521105540bf8fe153af44
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_982612_technical_incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Assign button</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
  if (current && current.operation() === 'insert') {
    // Get the current record
    var gr = new GlideRecord(current.table_name);
    gr.get(current.sys_id);

    // Check if the u_assignment_group and u_assigned_to fields already have values
    if (gr.u_assignment_group.nil() && gr.u_assigned_to.nil()) {
      // Get the sys_id of the "Application Development" group
      var groupGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
      groupGR.addQuery('name', 'Application Development');
      groupGR.query();
      if (groupGR.next()) {
        var groupId = groupGR.sys_id.toString();
      }

      // Set the value of the u_assignment_group reference field
      gr.u_assignment_group = groupId;

      // Set the value of the u_assigned_to reference field to the currently logged in user
      var userSessionGR = new GlideRecord('v_user_session');
      userSessionGR.addQuery('user', gs.getUserID());
      userSessionGR.query();
      if (userSessionGR.next()) {
        gr.u_assigned_to = userSessionGR.user.toString();
      }
    }

    // Set the value of the u_customer_state choice field
    gr.u_customer_state = 'assigned';

    // Update the record
    gr.update();
  }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 22:05:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>622b6eb8976521105540bf8fe153af44</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assign button</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Technical Exam" source="x_982612_technical">c7fdf35b979d21105540bf8fe153afb6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Exam">c7fdf35b979d21105540bf8fe153afb6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_622b6eb8976521105540bf8fe153af44</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 22:09:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=622b6eb8976521105540bf8fe153af44"/></record_update>
